devdoc.author: Ethereum Tag Service <security@ets.xyz>
devdoc.details: ETS Core utilizes Open Zeppelin UUPS upgradability pattern.

drawDown(address).details: Can be called by the account owner or on behalf of someone.Does nothing when there is nothing due to the account.

params._account: Target address that has had accrued ETH and which will receive the ETH.

getOrCreateTag(string,address,address).details: Looks in tagToTokenId map and returns if ETSTag is found for tag string Otherwise mints a new ETSTag and returns id.

params._publisher: publisher address, to attribute new ETSTag to if one s minted
params._tagString: tag string for ETSTag we are looking up.
params._tagger: tagger address, to attribute new ETSTag to if one s minted

getTaggingRecordFromId(uint256).details: Retrieves a tagging record from tagging ID

returns.publisher: Publisher through which the tag took place.
returns.sponsor: Address that paid for the transaction fee
returns.tagger: Address that tagged the NFT asset.

initialize(address,address).details: Replaces contructor function for UUPS Proxy contracts. Called upon first deployment.

params._ensure: Boolean flag, set true to ensure the target at time of tagging.
params._publisher: Address of publisher enabling the tagging record.
params._tagger: Address of tagger being credited performing tagging record.
params._tags: Strings target is being tagged with.
params._targetURI: Uniform resource identifier of the target being tagged.

params._account: Address of the account being queried.

returns._due: Amount of WEI in ETH due to account.

params._accessControls: Address of the access controls contract.

params._fee: Value of the fee in WEI.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

accrued.details: Map for holding amount accrued to participant address wallets.

paid.details: Map for holding lifetime amount drawn down from accrued by participants.

platformPercentage.details: Percentage of tagging fee allocated to ETS.

publisherPercentage.details: Percentage of tagging fee allocated to Publisher.

remainingPercentage.details: Percentage of tagging fee allocated to Creator or Owner.

taggingCounter.details: Incremental tagging record counter. Used for tagging record ID.

taggingFee.details: Fee in ETH Collected by ETS for tagging.

taggingRecords.details: Map of tagging id to tagging record.

targets.details: Map of target id to Target embodied by Target struct.

devdoc.title: ETS Core

computeTaggingRecordId(uint256,address,a.notice: Deterministically compute the tagging record identifier

drawDown(address).notice: Enables anyone to send ETH accrued by an account.

getOrCreateTag(string,address,address).notice: Fetch an etstagId from tag string.

getTaggingRecord(uint256,address,address.notice: Get tagging record from composite key parts

tagTarget(string[],string,address,addres.notice: Tag a target with an tag string.

totalDue(address).notice: Used to check how much ETH has been accrued by an address factoring in amount paid out.

updateAccessControls(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the access controls.

updateETSEnsure(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the ETSEnsure contract address.

updatePercentages(uint256,uint256).notice: Admin functionality for updating the percentages.

updateTaggingFee(uint256).notice: Sets the fee required to tag an NFT asset.

updateTaggingRecord(uint256,string[]).notice: Allow either a tagger or a sponsor to update the tags for a tagging record pointing to a target

updateTarget(uint256,string,string,uint2.notice: Updates a target with new values.

userdoc.notice: Core tagging contract that enables any online target to be tagged with an ETSTAG token.
